name: Bouncing Balls (itch) (mateoryhr)
description:
A platform game where you will go up, crossing magical portals and throwing your character, a ball of your choice with unique mechanics.

Two game modes:
Enjoy completing each level in classic mode. In this game mode you must try to win in the shortest time possible to get the best medal.
Or play the infinite mode, in which you can go from level to level and collect emeralds, as long as your time is not running out.

Multiple characters:
Master each character with their unique mechanics to get the highest scores.

Enjoy what you earned:
Enter to the store and use the emeralds. Buy new characters and customize them, change their colors, add accessories, and change their trail.

Play now.

For a better experience play in mobile --> Open in Google Playstore
